script: There is a Hospital in the center of my hometown.
High Street is a location in my home town, it is 1 KM, West from Hospital.
About 2 km South of the High Street there is a Park
I visited Library, which is 2 KM, West from Park.
Playground is a location in my home town, it is 2 KM, West from Library.
And finally there is Statue of Founder which is East from Playground and 2 KM from it.
Given the points of interest that I have told you about, how would I travel from Hospital to Statue of Founder following those interesting points?
expected_responses:
(Just an example, if exact instructions are followed)
From Hospital, go 1km West to High Street.
From High Street, go 2km South to Park.
From Park, go 2km West to Library.
From Library, go 2km West to Playground.
From Playground, go 2km East to Statue of Founder.
